description:
Alain de Soissons is the sergeant of the Company B, the troops assigned to http://anidb.net/ch51681 [Lady Oscar]`s service in the National Guard. He accepted Oscar at first, and even befriended http://anidb.net/ch51682 [Andr√©] and smuggled him in the troops, but after learning the truth about her he violently rejected her leadership.
Note: Fictional character not based on any living person.
name: Alain de Soissons
